name: DeepMind Technologies Limited
goal: DeepMind is a world leader in artificial intelligence (AI) research and its application for positive impact. Based in London, we recently announced a new AI lab in Paris - our first in continental Europe. Our mission is to push the boundaries of AI, developing programmes that can learn to solve any complex problem without needing to be taught how - increasing our capacity to tackle some of our most pressing real-world challenges, such as climate change and healthcare.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: GDPR; artificial intelligence; machine learning; innovation; skills, jobs and growth; future of the internet; data protection; intellectual property and licensing; research and development
